titleStmt.title: A Copy of verses presented to His Royal Higness [sic] at the Lord Bishop of Salisbury's on Monday the 15th of this instant September, 1684 to the illustrious and high born prince, Iames, Duke of York, and George, Prince of Denmarke.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for G. Croom, for the author,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
